summary: Find yourself a special follower called Freyja.
descriptionHtml:
To begin with, this is my first mod, and i am learning as i go along, so please be gentle with me.

Onto details!

This mod gives you a \"special\" follower. A particulary \"overpowered\" follower.

To start off, locate the Book in Belethor\'s shop in Whiterun.
(pictures show location)
That should provide everything you need to find your new follower.

The book, titled \"The Old Guard\" gives you a glimpse into what your new follower will be like, aswell as a short back story.

(sorry, i tried to make this a quest, but that\'s way over my head at this time)

Ok, it\'s been out for a while, so new pics have been uploaded, feel free to add any of yours :)
author: Vitticeps
